amendment.description: To require a report on modernizing and replacing hangers of the Army's Combat Aviation Brigade.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3933 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3933 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Perdue to Amendment SA 3896. (consideration: CR S2966-2969; text: CR S2967) To require a report on modernizing and replacing hangers of the Army's Combat Aviation Brigade.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3933 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3933 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Perdue to Amendment SA 3896.
